SELECT a.system_id , c.code_name AS system_nm , b.pgm_code , b.pgm_name , a.pgm_path , a.pgm_path_param , a.user_id, a.user_name, a.ip_addr, TO_CHAR(a.access_dtm,'HH24:MI:SS MM-DD-YYYY') as access_dtm FROM SYS0078M a , SYS0050M b, SYS0013M c WHERE 1=1 AND A.PGM_PATH = B.PGM_PATH(+) AND c.CODE_MASTER_ID = 336 AND c.CODE = A.SYSTEM_ID AND a.system_id = #{systemId} AND a.ACCES_DAY BETWEEN TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(REPLACE(#{frDate},'/',''),'DDMMYYYY'), 'YYYYMMDD') AND TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(REPLACE(#{toDate},'/',''),'DDMMYYYY'), 'YYYYMMDD') /* Essential Param*/
AND (UPPER(a.pgm_code) LIKE UPPER(#{pgmCode}) || '%' OR UPPER(b.pgm_name) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{pgmCode}) || '%')
AND (UPPER(a.user_id) LIKE UPPER(#{userId}) || '%' OR UPPER(a.user_name) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{userId}) || '%')
AND a.ip_addr LIKE #{ipAddr} || '%'
ORDER BY a.system_id , a.access_dtm desc

SELECT DISTINCT a.system_id , (SELECT a.code_name FROM SYS0013M a WHERE a.code_master_id = 336 AND a.code = a.system_id) AS system_nm , b.pgm_code , b.pgm_name , TO_CHAR(a.access_dtm,'MM/DD/YYYY') as access_day , TO_CHAR(a.access_dtm,'HH24') as access_time , COUNT(a.access_dtm) OVER(PARTITION BY TO_CHAR(a.access_dtm,'YYYYMMDDHH24'), a.pgm_code, a.system_id) as access_dtm_cnt FROM SYS0078M a , SYS0050M b WHERE 1=1 AND A.PGM_PATH = B.PGM_PATH(+) AND a.system_id = #{systemId} AND a.ACCES_DAY BETWEEN TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(REPLACE(#{frDate},'/',''),'DDMMYYYY'), 'YYYYMMDD') AND TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(REPLACE(#{toDate},'/',''),'DDMMYYYY'), 'YYYYMMDD') /* Essential Param*/
AND (UPPER(a.pgm_code) LIKE UPPER(#{pgmCode}) || '%' OR UPPER(b.pgm_name) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{pgmCode}) || '%')
ORDER BY a.system_id , b.pgm_name

SELECT a.user_id , a.user_name , TO_CHAR(a.access_dtm,'HH24:MI:SS MM-DD-YYYY') as access_dtm FROM SYS0078M a , SYS0050M b WHERE 1=1 AND A.PGM_PATH = B.PGM_PATH(+) AND a.system_id = #{systemId} AND b.pgm_code(+) = #{pgmCode} AND TO_CHAR(a.access_dtm,'HH24MMDDYYYY') = #{searchDt} ORDER BY a.access_dtm
